title: @KateyKhaos Bloodmoon Diana cosplay
body:
I just had a question about what Blood Moon Diana wears. I'm planning to do a gender bend cosplay of her and I was just wondering what the clothing she wears is called and if there was a male equivalent. Thanks!

Beforehand I was gonna copy Hanzo from Overwatch's clothing and just chalk it up to artistic expression before I found out he was actually wearing clothing that a Japanese archer would wear which makes me kind of want to shy away from that.

replies.body:
Hey! 

So, there isn't any specific piece of clothing that we based this off of, which isn't super helpful for you. ;-; I'd be happy to grab you some in-game screen shots if you'd like, if that'll help you bring Blood Moon Diana to life. ^^

XD o dratz. I actually saw a lot of good screenshots in the other thread that was discussing the Diana tattoo. If there was one thing that could help, it would probably be a flat view of her curved blade so I can accurately draw the dimensions.

Thanks for responding btw ^^!

Happy to! Does this work for ya? If you need anything else, lemme know! :) 

https://imgur.com/AwD6NUT

Hey here's a pic of the finished cosplay ^^ 

http://puu.sh/zV9CC.jpg
Holy crap, this came out amazing!! Thank you so much for sharing this!! <3
I came into this thread thinking you cosplay, now Iâ€™m wondering if blood moon Nami should be a thing.
I used to. :P I've been championing for a Blood Moon Nami internally, tbh.
